alert.note: Alert for Haakon; Jackson; Mellette (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 25 at 12:43PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Haakon, northwestern Mellette and northeastern Jackson Counties through 130 PM MDT/230 PM CDT/... At 1243 PM MDT/143 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 3 miles northeast of Belvidere, or 14 miles east of Kadoka, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Midland. This includes Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 156 and 174. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
